# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no position available) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using electricity group without being plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
-  Ensure that the pipe group has fluid before attempting to use it

# NAMESPACE
*Important variables:*
- `burner-mining-drill`: position(x=41.0, y=-82.0), status=EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
- `stone-furnace`: position(x=41.0, y=-80.0), status=EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
- `offshore-pump`: position(x=106.5, y=-32.5), status=EntityStatus.WORKING
- `boiler`: position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), status=EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
- `steam-engine`: position(x=117.5, y=-30.5), status=EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED
*Utility functions:*
- None available in the provided logs.
